documents.document: Great Service Again Family and friends spent another great weekend in NYC - Two nights at a Residence Inn at Newark airport and one night at the Marquis. The front desk clerk at the Marquis (Delores) was quick, efficient and pleasant and allowed an early check in. Multiple elevator trips and NO problems experienced! The rooms were excellent. I would definitly recommend this hotel to anyone planning to visit the city and wants to stay in Times Square.
